Template used: "How does the 120-night trial period work?"; last updated: 2023-01-24 22:38:02.684
Template used: "Return policy"; last updated: 2023-01-24 22:40:46.090

Plank Mattress: Good question! If during your 120-night sleep trial (which begins once your mattress has been delivered), you decide that you are not completely happy with your mattress, we will help assist you with the return process. Please also note that we do require that you try your new mattress for at least 30 days from the date of delivery. This gives you ample time to properly adjust to the new materials. You can also check out our detailed return policy here: https://plankmattress.attn.tv/aYId7ypRSO1q Hope this helps!
